game.description: Retrieve the legendary Sword of Light from the depths of the Dragon's Spine mountains.
game.objective: Bring the Sword of Light back to the village elder.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, increased reputation with the villagers

tasks.description: Venture into the Dragon's Spine mountains and locate the ancient ruins where the sword is said to be hidden.
tasks.objective: Find the entrance to the ancient ruins.

tasks.description: Navigate through the treacherous tunnels and avoid deadly traps set by the ancient civilization.
tasks.objective: Reach the inner sanctum where the sword is kept.

tasks.description: Defeat the powerful dragon guarding the Sword of Light.

game.title: The Quest for the Sword of Light
